column1: [Charania] After hitting a game-winner to win The Basketball Tournament $1M prize, guard Keifer Sykes has agreed to a deal with the Indiana Pacers, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium.
[Indiana Pacers] The Pacers have waived Keifer Sykes, Terry Taylor and Nate Hinton. Additionally, they have signed Justin Anderson, Bennie Boatwright and Derek Culver.
